headline: Manchester's Most
Trusted Tattoo Studio
hero.subheadline: Located in the heart of the Northern Quarter's creative scene, we've earned over 200 five-star reviews through exceptional artistry and service

portfolio.subtitle: From bold traditional pieces to intricate fine line work, every tattoo tells a story

sessions.subtitle: Professional tattooing in Manchester's most creative district
sessions.guarantee: All work backed by our studio guarantee

testimonials.quote: Absolutely brilliant experience at Fellowship. The atmosphere in Chatham Mill is perfect and the work speaks for itself. Couldn't recommend more highly.
testimonials.author: James K.

testimonials.quote: Been to a few places around Manchester but nothing comes close to the quality here. Worth every penny and the Northern Quarter location is spot on.
testimonials.author: Emma T.

paragraphs: Nestled in the creative heart of Chatham Mill, Fellowship MCR has become synonymous with exceptional tattooing in Manchester's Northern Quarter. Our studio sits on the third floor of this historic mill, surrounded by artists, designers, and makers who share our commitment to quality craftsmanship.

What sets us apart isn't just our perfect five-star rating or our prime location – it's our approach to tattooing as both art and service. Every client who walks through our doors becomes part of the Fellowship family, and our 200+ glowing reviews reflect the care and attention we put into every single piece.
about.callout: Every tattoo is a collaboration between artist and client, creating something truly unique
about.imageAlt: Fellowship MCR Tattoo artist at work

items.question: How do I book a session?
items.answer: You can book through our website, give us a call on 07717 066189, or drop by the studio in Chatham Mill. For custom work, we recommend booking a consultation first to discuss your ideas properly.

items.question: What's your deposit policy?
items.answer: We require a £50 deposit to secure your booking, which comes off your final bill. Deposits are non-refundable but can be transferred to a new date with 48 hours notice.

items.question: Do you do walk-ins?
items.answer: We welcome walk-ins for flash work and smaller pieces, though availability varies. For the best chance of getting tattooed same-day, we'd suggest calling ahead or following our Instagram for daily updates.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Join the Fellowship?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your session at Manchester's most trusted tattoo studio

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo ideas and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to arrange your appointment.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for choosing Fellowship MCR. We'll be in touch within 24 hours to confirm your session details.
